entities.name: black
entities.description: Sirius Black, a suspect in the murder of James and Lily Potter, is described as having waxy white skin and being scary-looking.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is reading about Sirius Black's past crimes and is shocked by the number of people he murdered.

entities.name: stan
entities.description: Stan is watching Harry read and comments on how scary-looking Sirius Black is.

entities.name: ern
entities.description: Ern is also present and agrees with Stan that Sirius Black's actions were big trouble.

entities.name: james potter
entities.description: James Potter was murdered by Sirius Black.

entities.name: lily potter
entities.description: Lily Potter was also murdered by Sirius Black.

relationships.description: Harry is reading about Sirius Black's past crimes.
Stan comments on how scary-looking Sirius Black is.
Ern agrees with Stan that Sirius Black's actions were big trouble.
Sirius Black also murdered Lily Potter.
